Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

So someone told me that my game randomly crashes every now and then. According to him there is no rhyme or reason about why it happens either. Sometimes it'll play for a half hour and sometimes it'll crash after five minutes. I wasn't sure if this could be a problem with Quest itself so I just wanted to report it just in case.

He mentioned he didn't seem any cause for the game's crash either (like no error messages or anything).

Anonynn.
